name: Mastermind (itch) (Overworld)
description:
I made this in a weekend after moving house.
I lost the physical copy of the game during the move so I quickly knocked together this so I could play something after the move.
I ended up finding the board game after the move but this version has the ability to change the number of colors in the code and the width of the code, so you can play most of the variations.

Mastermind is a Board Game from the 1970's that's played between two players, one makes and hides a code, the other guesses he code. Here you take on the role of the guesser.

Each row of guesses will give you some information:
White pips: correct color and placement of that many dots
Black pips: correct color, incorrect placement of that many dots
Red pips: incorrect color and placement of that many dots (normally not included in the board game, but when you're playing a code with 8 items to guess you need the extra information)
